short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A floating todo app that persists across web pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 Floating Todo App is a lightweight browser extension that helps you stay organized and productive by providing a floating, draggable todo list that persists across web pages. Whether you're researching, working, or just browsing, this app is always within reach to capture your tasks and ideas without disrupting your workflow.

✨ Key Features:
🟡 Floating Interface: A sleek, draggable todo widget that stays visible as you navigate different pages.
💾 Task Persistence: Your todos are saved locally, ensuring they remain accessible even after closing or reloading the browser.
🎨 Minimalist Design: A clean, user-friendly interface designed to boost productivity.
⚡ Quick Add: Easily add tasks with a single click and start organizing immediately.
📍 Customizable Position: Move the widget anywhere on your screen for convenience.

✅ Stay on top of your tasks effortlessly with the Floating Todo App! 🚀
